document.full_text: former high jump world record holder patrik sjoberg has shocked swedish athletics by revealing that his coach and stepfather viljo nousiainen sexually abused him as a young boy.
document.title: swedish high jumper sjoberg reveals sexual abuse
lines_and_colors: former high jump world record holder patrik sjoberg has shocked swedish athletics by revealing that his coach and stepfather viljo nousiainen sexually abused him as a young boy.
